column4: does anyone have some advice about installing pear packages (php pear)... I keep getting errors while trying to install using sudo pear install <packagename>
pear has never been anything but trouble for me. are you sure the package isn't just packaged in the repos? much easier.
how can I check that.. pear is one thing that is fairly new to me
even this gives me nothing but errors "pear download-all" error after error... nothing downloading
